body:
The explicit use of tls.Conn makes it hard to use something like [LimitListener](https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/net/netutil#LimitListener) while still having http.Request.TLS work properly, as described by this issue. That's what I'm dealing with currently.

It would be workable if a request could grab its underlying net.Conn. Maybe that could be added to the request context?
